description:
With the exams over, Pirari Academy enters the winter break. Everyone at the dorm heads home for New Year`s Eve, leaving Nina alone to fully enjoy some peace and quiet. Join her and the rest of Pirari Academy as they relax on New Year`s Eve.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Compte à rebours de l`année / Les femmes ne résistent pas au chocolat
Ichinen no Kei wa Countdown ni Ari / Sue Choco Kuwanu wa Onna no Haji
The Countdown Is the Time to Plan Your Year Around / Shameful Is She Who Spurns Chocolate
一年の計はカウントダウンにあり / 据えチョコ食わぬは女の恥
일년의 계획은 카운트다운에 세워라 / 차려놓은 쵸코렛도 못 먹는건 여자의 수치
